BasicInfo.short: 100% Salesforce Native Billing & Telecom Order Management Provider

Products.name: Telquote
Products.description: Supports telecom CPQ by automating profit analyses based upon term, pricing options and discounts to meet bottom line.

Products.name: O2B (Order to Billing)
Products.description: Subscription management of volume or anniversary bills, pro-rate, usage ratings, recurring, one-time charges, and credit card integration.

Products.name: TOM (Telecom Order Management)
Products.description: Brings efficiency and centralization of telecom quote, order, delivery, track and change to the disconnected world of telecommunication.

Products.name: Configurator
Products.description: A full function CPQ designed to offer assisted, question-based selling.

Products.name: Sequencer
Products.description: Essential Business Process Management tool to design, execute and monitor long state-full processes for any standard or custom object.
